title: The Bible is Unreliable and Should not be Taken as Fact or Proof of God

author: alannamueller89
text:
The Bible is literally the worst book I've ever read, in terms of contradictions and general: it doesn't make any sense and the events in the old testament aren't supported by a single shred of historical/archeological/scientific evidence.

But here some of the (unlimited) dirty tricks Christians will use to get you to believe in this aweful book:
-"bro, you just need to believe first then the bible will make sense"
-"no, don't read the Bible literally! You need someone (priest) to explain it to you!"
-"that's out of context"
-"that's a metaphor, not literal"
-"this contradiction is not important"
-"well that's just a scribal error"
-"no archaeological evidence of the exodus exists because God destroyed all the evidence".
-"where in the Bible does it say the earth is flat? Oh that's just bs"

The list of copes by the Bible believers are endless. These people have been indoctrinated since they were kids, if they don't seek out the truth by themselves, and believe the religion they have been born into just happens to be the right one out of sheer luck... Then they will never find the truth.
